hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah that :the Messenger of Allah (saas) said: "There are three supplications that will undoubtedly be answered: the supplication of one who has been wronged; the supplication of the traveler; and the supplication of a father for his child

chapter.eng-name: A Father's Supplication And The Supplication Of The One Who Has Been Wronged
